Description: Gold finger-ring; plain rounded hoop, with flattened oval bezel; bust of Serapis, draped and wearing modius, in relief, attached to hoop.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (232)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
